content: Feb 5 Specialty chemical manufacturer W.R. Grace & Co said it would split into two companies in a tax-free transaction to shareholders  driving up its shares by as much as 15 percent.
name: WR Grace & Co
title: UPDATE 2-Chemical maker W.R. Grace to split in two  shares jump

content: Feb 5 Specialty chemicals maker W.R. Grace & Co  said it would split into two public companies through a tax-free transaction to shareholders aimed at improving strategic focus  simplifying operating structures and making better use of capital.
name: WR Grace & Co
title: Chemical maker WR Grace to split into two companies
